name: The Collector - ALPHA
description:
"The Collector"  is a Visual Novel about a cop in pursuit of a serial kidnapper, who gets in over her head.

THIS IS ONLY THE ALPHA FOR THE GAME.   We didn't end up having the time/resources to continue it like it was, so we have since decided to take a simpler approach... similar to a typical Visual Novel.   

To get access to the actual game, join "The Collector"  Patreon at the $10 level https://www.patreon.com/heartgear
